title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 103.5 - No U turns
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 103.5 - No U turns

State Regulations
A U turn on the Thruway system is prohibited except when
approved and supervised by a member of the State Police or an employee of the

Thruway Authority. Excepted from the provisions of this section are such
authorized vehicles as are described under section
103.4
of this Part, and then only
under such conditions as are described therein. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
103.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
